alert.note: Alert for Merrimack; Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 6:56PM EDT until August 04 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT FOR SULLIVAN AND WESTERN MERRIMACK COUNTIES... At 656 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 13 miles southwest of Lebanon to 10 miles northwest of Newport to near Claremont to 6 miles north of Alstead to near Walpole, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Claremont, Henniker, New London, Grafton, Charlestown, Enfield, Bradford, Danbury, Newport, Warner, Marlow, Alstead, Hillsborough, Grantham, Andover, Cornish, Lempster, Hill, Acworth and Goshen. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 18 and 48. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
